greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangular array, read by rows: T(n,k) = numerator of binomial(n-1, n-k)/k!, 1 <= k <= n.
mathematica: T[n_, k_] := Numerator[Binomial[n-1, n-k]/k!]; Table[T[n, k], {n,1,10}, {k,1,n}] // Flatten (* _Amiram Eldar_, Nov 27 2018 *)
results.author: _Seiichi Manyama_, Nov 27 2018
